Quote: When you realize nothing is lacking, the whole world belongs to you
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: What the superior man seeks is in himself; what the small man seeks is in others
Author: Confucius

Quote: To seek is to suffer. To seek nothing is bliss.
Author: Bodhidharma

Quote: Mind is like a mad monkey
Author: Sathya Sai Baba
